text.text_translated:
Julie Wong is a top researcher.
She works with robots and AI.
She writes many papers.
She is the author of more than 50 papers.
She also writes papers with other people.
These papers are in very good journals.
Other researchers read and check her papers.
She often talks at international meetings.
In 2012, a big group gave her a special award.
It was the Simone Fielding award.
This award helps her do important work.
Julie lives with her family.
She lives in a smart home she designed herself.

feedback.feedback: PASS: The text successfully meets all A2 readability standards and accurately conveys the original meaning. The factual integrity is maintained, and both MeaningBERT (0.8646) and BERTScore (0.9022) are well within the required thresholds. The CEFR classifier correctly identified the text as A2. The vocabulary is appropriate for A2, with complex terms like 'peer-reviewed' and 'fellowship' effectively simplified into A2-level explanations ('Other researchers read and check her papers' and 'This award helps her do important work'). Sentence structures are consistently short and simple, avoiding complex clauses or connectors beyond basic conjunctions. This is an exemplary A2 simplification.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Julie Wong is a top researcher.
She works with robots and AI.
She writes many papers.
She is the author of more than 50 papers.
She also writes papers with other people.
These papers are in very good journals.
Other researchers read and check her papers.
She often talks at international meetings.
In 2012, the Royal Academy gave her a special award.
It was the Simone Fielding award.
This award helps her do important work.
Julie lives with her family.
She lives in a smart home she designed herself.
